snippet: Denying the vote to people who have committed felonies but have completed their sentences offends fundamental tenets of democracy.
abstract: Editorial contends policies that deny right to vote to people who have committed felonies but have completed their sentences offend fundamental tenets of democracy.
lead_paragraph: Denying the vote to people who have committed felonies but have completed their sentences offends fundamental tenets of democracy.

headline.content_kicker: Editorial | The Struggle to Cast a Vote
